website_summaries.verdict: A solid choice for customers wanting an oversized, reversible couch cover at a cheaper price point than other models.
pros: Customers enjoy the water resistant material
Elastic band wraps around the back of the couch and secures the cover
cons: Water resistant materials may fade if the cover is washed

customer_reviews.title: Slippery
customer_reviews.text: This cover does not stay in place. It is great if you never sit on the couch. It looks nice and washes well. This company offered me a refund for a five star review. I refused as this was unethical. Then I received an email telling me my money was refunded and they still want a change in my review. Well here it is.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon

customer_reviews.title: I'm very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I am very disappointed. I purchased two for my sofas and they do not stay secured. If you look at these covers too long they slide out of place. I was expecting them to be more secured. There is nothing to hold the top of the cover in place, so as soon as you sit down, the top of the cover slides down behind your head. The arm rest part doesn't stay put and the strap on the covers only secure the middle of the covers. There should be straps to secure the headrest area as well as the bottom so it stays in place. I wasted $55!
customer_reviews.author: K. Woods

customer_reviews.title: not hunter green color as stated
customer_reviews.text: I purchased 2 of these covers for my extra wide sofas. The color I chose was hunter green. Upon receiving, I noticed the color is actually lawn green and not the dark green hunter color, shown in the pics. Even though I am disappointed that it is not the color stated and shown in the pics, the overall quality of these covers were made very well and the texture of the material is also very well constructed. Except for the color not being hunter green, overall, I do like these covers.
customer_reviews.author: niteizes

customer_reviews.title: Not waterproof despite claims in the pictures
customer_reviews.text: We bought this as a cover for our couch with the intention of being waterproof (as claimed in the images). We unfortunately didn't read the fine print that it is not waterproof (despite the claims in the images). Our cat peed on it and the first time it worked well as waterproof. But as soon as we washed it, the coating or whatever made it waterproof went away. The cover itself is good quality and easily washable in the washing machine. It's not too heavy so you can easily throw it on and take it off as well. Just don't expect any water or liquid resistance, it just soaks right through after washing it one time.
customer_reviews.author: RVanOrden

customer_reviews.title: Nice couch cover for Shawn the horse
customer_reviews.text: I like the coverage of the couch. It keeps all the hair on top and not falling onto the couch. I don't like that the couch is now not very soft and that hair on the couch cover sticks to the couch cover. I think I'll have to wash it in the washing machine a lot more than I expected. It came with a strange elastic piece I still never figured out how to use. It didn't come with instructions. Style-wise, our work couch now looks pretty homey. Perhaps pillows will make it better. We do have a throw blanket we bought separately that looks nicer than nothing on top. Horse is pictured for scale!
customer_reviews.author: nikki

customer_reviews.title: Surprised
customer_reviews.text: I just received this today. After removing the cover I wash it right away. It had the ‘new’ smell to it. It wash and dried nicely. I have a Lay z boy reclining loveseat which a bit bigger than a regular loveseat so I ordered the couch cover and it fits perfect. The elastic band has enough give that it was no problem securing it around the back of the furniture. Doesn’t get too hot when sitting on it and covers the entire loveseat nicely while protecting the material from my 2 dogs who like to snuggle and wrestle on my furniture. Definitely worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Addict

customer_reviews.title: Happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.text: I bought the black and gray cover without measuring my sofa. It is an inch or two short on either end but not terribly noticeable. It’s my own fault for not measuring my sofa so definitely recommend doing that before ordering. Otherwise, it was easy to put on, nice colors as expected, seems like it’ll be reasonably durable. Have not washed them yet so I’ll update this review if needed after I do. It feels comfortable to sit on, like you’re sitting on a cotton quilt.
customer_reviews.author: TXLA

customer_reviews.title: Worth buying
customer_reviews.text: I got them this morning, the material is thick it matches my couches. I bought the extra lg cover for a 3 cushion couch if fits like the picture, I don’t think a regualar sofa would fit. I bought the sofa size for a two cushion couch, it’s to big for the couch it covers the entire couch how I wanted it’s a bit to big but it does not bother me. Hope pictures help.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Simple to use, easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: Seriously love this thing. Keep it on our couch in the living room that inevitability turns into the dog's bed every night when we aren't looking. We have a great dane and he sheds. ALOT. This protects the couch, and when we have company over it's such a breeze to take off and throw it in the washer. Before we were washing the cushion covers individually, and trying to pick off the coarse dog hair was a pain. Highly recommend for the price. Definitely made my life easier!
customer_reviews.author: H. Trabel

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the value, not secure
customer_reviews.text: Cover keeps on slipping from the sofa. It gets very uncomfortable to sit on sofa. And every time I get up I need to fix the cover first to sit back in it. The strap that goes behind the back is so tight and insecure that it feels it going to break or open and hit me on my face. It also squeezes the sofa and looks like will rip the sofa in sometime
customer_reviews.author: NG

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and terrific price!
customer_reviews.text: I bought the standard size and it fit perfectly. The cover is heavy enough to stay in place. It came with a strap, but I did not think it needed it. If it were any bigger, it'd be difficult to tuck and make fit. The material is comfortable and personally, I don't mind the way it feels on my skin. It reminds me of a quilt. I haven't spilled anything on it, but it seems like it would be water resistant. The stitching is sturdy and I have no problems with tears or ripping. The color is true to the picture shown. I'm very satisfied with my purchase and would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Ginger J.

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Not a bad product. Definitely does what it claims to do in keeping the couch clean. Our family has a dog that gets on the furniture and it keeps the hair and drool (he's a Boxer) off of our new couches. I plan on ordering a 2nd for while this one is in the wash. I only gave 4 stars because I don't find them attractive; I will remove them when we have company.
customer_reviews.author: LaHa

customer_reviews.title: Throw it in the garbage.
customer_reviews.text: I feel that I have a regular couch, but based on the reviews and photos I went with oversized. It fits very poorly. I thought it would be better than an oversized blanket but it really isn't. Doesn't stay in place as pictured. It honestly looks ridiculous. I can't say to the actual quality because I don't think I will be using it. It looks that clownish. Update. This is absolute garbage. Not only did it look hideous on the couch (does not stay flat and neat as pictured) the etire back snapped off pretty much meaning I'm throwing it out. Waste of money. Even though my measurements didn't exceed the limit, the band snappde and came right off.
customer_reviews.author: Lionheart

customer_reviews.title: Looks like it should be used by a  furniture moving company
customer_reviews.text: I ordered cream/grey for my sofa and recliner. The grey is more like blue and looks like a fabric moving pad for furniture. My son asked if it was one of his fathers "tarps" from the garage. It was embarrassing.. I removed them from my furniture. You get what you pay for.. lesson learned.
customer_reviews.author: CB

customer_reviews.title: Easy to clean, doesn't stay in place
customer_reviews.text: This cover works ok and has held up to moderate use for the last month. It is easy to vacuum off pet hair and crumbs. Also washes well. It absorbs liquid (not water proof). My problem with it is that it constantly slides down the couch when you sit on it. It has an elastic strap that runs around the back of the couch, but it does nothing to keep it in place, really. I have to re-position it daily, which is very annoying. Well built, but doesn't function particularly well. Would not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Lola Lu

customer_reviews.title: Absolute garbage. Might as well use a bed sheet
customer_reviews.text: This couch cover is the worst thing I’ve ever bought. I bought another brand for my other couch and I bought this brand for my other because of the selective measurements. The other brand is much higher quality and actually stitched. This brand seems to have used thin glue to attach two thin sheets together. Regular use of us and our guests and my small dogs have cause it to tear in multiple places and the sheet is pilling and no longer comfortable to even touch or sit on. Choose another brand and save money.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Great product at a reasonable price
customer_reviews.text: I have to big dogs that love the couch and use the back to prop themselves on it to look out the window. I’ve always used blankets to protect the couch but needed something way more protective. This thing is great! It looks nice, covers all my extra long sofa, and is comfortable to sit on. I especially love the straps that hold the back cover on securely. I was having to put the blankets back up and over the back of the couch several times a day because the pups would pull them off.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Cheap and falls apart easily
customer_reviews.text: The first thing I noticed was the attachments that are supposed to attached the strap to the cover weren't affixed to the strap. I had to remove the stitches on the strap attach the hook and restitch it. Then every time I came out and a dog jumps off the couch I have to straighten the cover. This is multiple times a day. The cover itself is crap. It is NOT water resistant. The stitching is coming out everywhere. The white part on the back is separating from the top. It is ridiculous. Guess ya get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don't bother. Save ur money and couch.
customer_reviews.text: Slips off. The strap broke. We have to put it backwards to keep in on when ppl sit. Putting the long side from the arm rests over the top of the couch leaving it not falling covering the bottom of the couch. Had it 3 full months and washed it a few times and its falling apart litteraly at the seems. Its not water resistant at all. Our new couch is ruined already in a few months because this waste of money didn't work.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon noneurbiz

customer_reviews.title: Very Mediocre and Poor Color Choice on the Stitching
customer_reviews.text: My last sofa and loveseat covers which I purchased thru amazon were great. It's time to replace the sofa cover - not able to find the exact one I purchased a few years ago so I tried this one. Upon opening it I was surprised there is little to no batting compared to the one I'm trying to replace. Also the stitching isn't brown it's kind of reminds me of fishing line so when you hold the cover up to the light you can see the white back peeking through. Not impressed. Typical - the quality of so many things these days keeps getting cheaper and cheaper - and the prices remain the same or go up. Wasn't for me.
customer_reviews.author: OneSpiritGal

customer_reviews.title: Product not as advertised!
customer_reviews.text: Product was not as advertised, but does have a decent look. 1. Only about 63" wide instead of the advertised 68". 5 inches doesn't sound like much, but could be the difference in your couch being covered or having a gap on either end as with ours. 2. Cover has stitched, week elastic, cloth strip to go around the corners of the couch. The diagram said that it had a hooked strap and made it sound like it went completely around the couch to hold it in place. These may not be big issues for some, but it makes a big difference regarding fit.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Jones

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy! It leaks!
customer_reviews.text: Don’t buy! It leaks! I should have listened to the reviews. 1. It fits terribly. Yes they send all kinds of notes about how it should fit but it’s awkward and dies not fit or look good. 2. It leaks. Twice my dog has had an accident on it and it went right through. It didn’t even slow it down going into the cushions. It’s a flimsy piece of fabric only, that doesn’t look good and offers zero protection. Save yourself some money and put an old, ugly sheet over your couch. It will look better and offer the same protection.
customer_reviews.author: Toph

customer_reviews.title: Nice Slip Cover
customer_reviews.text: I like this sofa slip cover. I haven't had it that long but I like how it's double sided and has an elastic strap to keep it in place. I got it because my Kitty was scratching at my sofa, causing a little damage. Now, the damage is covered and so far, the slip cover seems to be resistant to Kitty's little claws. All in all, I'm quite pleased with it.
customer_reviews.author: marla dunkin

customer_reviews.title: Color description not accurate
customer_reviews.text: I don't know anything about the fit, I didn't even take it out of his package. I ordered one that was called at Sea Foam that reverses to cream. I received a bright turquoise that reverses to a light gray with turquoise stitching. It went back immediately.
customer_reviews.author: IwishIwasonthebeach

customer_reviews.title: Would have been 5 star IF
customer_reviews.text: as you can see I had to modify it for my recliner couch and had to resew the secure straps for the back and add strap for the foot rest. Bought 2, first one came with no back strap at all, had to sew on my own. so if the engineering/design and quality had been better it would be a 5 star item easily. But even with all those flaws it's the best serves my purpose out of the several others I have tried. Good think I can sew. I also have a recliner love seat with a center consul so I bought 2 recliner chairs for it and they worked out fine.
customer_reviews.author: lsh

customer_reviews.title: Not bad for the price.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to protect my couch from my 8yr old German Shepherd Dog. It fits all right despite the sizing guide but the arm guards don't stay where it's supposed to. It is easy to wash but make sure to buckle the straps when you wash it to prevent them from getting caught on anything. I've already had one of the straps that hold the cover in place break after a week of use. Every time my dog gets on or off the couch I have to readjust the cover to make it fit again. Overall I'm glad I have something in the meantime to protect my furniture but I might look for another one in the near future.
customer_reviews.author: Tina B.

customer_reviews.title: I love these covers
customer_reviews.text: I loved these couch covers. I bought one for the large couch and one for the love seat. I was a little worried because my couch has a lot of stuffing, seeming more than a normal couch. It fits good and looks good.easy to take off and put in the wash. I have two dogs who make my house a hairy mess but these keep the hair and any dirt the dogs might be carrying around off the new couch. It’s comfy material to so it doesn’t feel weird having it on. The arm part of the cover tends to get knocked off by the dogs but during normal use it’s stays on really well. I’d recommend these
customer_reviews.author: Amazoncustomer

customer_reviews.title: Just as advertised
customer_reviews.text: I received the RHF Reversible Sofa Cover, Couch Covers for 3 Cushion Couch on time, and was able to place directly on my couch due to no odor, and softness. I have washed the cover once in cool/cold wash/rinse, and dried on moderate heat. The couch cover came out of the laundry like brand new, which surprised me. I have a cat, and my cat's hair only sticks to this cover mildly. Overall, I am very pleased with this couch cover, the color was true to the picture, the size was correct, and it appears that it will hold up under regular use. After washing, liquid would still bead on the material, but wipe quickly to avoid absorption of liquids.
customer_reviews.author: Mae

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work with my couch
customer_reviews.text: Apparently I "don't have the right couch" for this item. I cannot use the strap that came with it to secure the cover and the over the arm covers won't stay up at all. The back part moves towards the side someone is sitting on and the bottom part chills on the floor once everything else moves around. It is perfect for my couch if no one ever sits on it. The product itself is good. I just wish it would work with my couch. It is more of an aggravation for me fixing it everyday.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Merlot/Tan looks Nice
customer_reviews.text: I've just got Leather Furnitures few days ago, and want them to last as long as possible. It looks nice. I haven't sat on it yet or tested it for water resistance and easy to clean parts. I will update my review in the future. Update: These do slip off and need adjustments, which is expected. I had fitted covers with my old fabric sofa and loveseat set, and those slipped too. I expect slippage since these are not sewn unto the furnitures.
customer_reviews.author: Aroman

customer_reviews.title: Not all that great
customer_reviews.text: While it is easy to put on the couch it does not stay in place well when you have pets and children. Which is the whole reason I need a cover. I ordered the xl size for my couch and even measured my couch and it doesn’t fit well at all. My couch is once again not covered because this cover is just a hassle to constantly adjust. Ended up being a waste of money. The dark grey isn’t a true grey. Has more of a purple blue color against my grey couch. And the light grey side is more of a beige color m
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Harper

customer_reviews.title: More of a dark moss green
customer_reviews.text: I did not buy this as a couch cover. So I can only review it in a general manner. The color is more of a dark moss green, not a true hunter green. I am using this as a floor dog blanket for two large breed dogs. It does not slide around on the hardwood floor, I have no idea about how it would work on a couch. Seems a medium density, not a thick cover at all. However, it does clean easily (of white dog hair) and it feels fine. The dogs instantly stretched out on it, and went to sleep.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Much easier to clean than a whole couch
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I expected. It fits well on my sofa despite having bulky, over-sized pillows instead of a normal back cushion. Yes, there is minor shifting that takes place when we sit on it, but that is going to happen with any cover. It certainly moves much less than a throw blanket would. We minimized the slumping/sagging/movement by pulling & tucking extra fabric into the creases when we first set it up, this allows for more natural movement of the cover with the cushions. Finally I can clean the dog smell & fur off my couch without having to remove every cushion and cover!
customer_reviews.author: Kira

customer_reviews.title: Perfect, perfect, perfect
customer_reviews.text: This is absolutely perfect!!! Exactly what I wanted and needed. I put it on the “man cave” futon and it’s great! The mattress is fairly new but there a couple of spills on it that I couldn’t get out. I didn’t want a cover cause they’re too hard to deal with so I took a chance and ordered this and I’m so glad I did. I really liked the measurements photo the seller had too and I used them. I will for sure order this again when/if needed. Thank you for a great product oh and it’s even reversible if needed.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy Crawford

customer_reviews.title: Eurolounger fills the bill!
customer_reviews.text: I like the adjustable arms, the extra length, the sturdiness, and clean-ability of the real leather for a great price. Mine was a floor model so it was assembled for me. One problem was the directions said the outlet/USB cord was in the zipper compartment underneath the couch and that was empty (where the legs were), so I emailed the company and they called me back promptly. I learned that there is 'another' zipper where I finally found the cord. So the instructions are incorrect, but I was able to get quick response from the company.
customer_reviews.author: hubbardbarb

customer_reviews.title: A bit long
customer_reviews.text: This is longer than the couch. We bought it to help protect the couch from the dogs. It is not as nice looking as I would have liked because of the fit / style. Because I am not a fan of the style we did purchase a second couch cover of a different style to cover up this more durable cover. This is a three cushion couch.
customer_reviews.author: tnc

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful customer service beautiful product
customer_reviews.text: So I was so excited to get this and put it on but it didn't fit correctly but customer service was so so helpful they immediately tried to fix the problem and followed up to make sure I was happier best support I have ever dealt with....
customer_reviews.author: MaryBeth

customer_reviews.title: I wanted to like this
customer_reviews.text: Pros: I have two dogs and they constantly jump on the couch with muddy paws. The cover was OK when it was on the couch for blocking the mud. I also washed it a few times and it held up very well! Cons: This cover had some issues falling off of the couch and getting stuck in the cracks. We ended up taking it off of the couch because it kept slipping off and it was more of a hassle. I wish we had bought the covers that go all of the way over the couch.
customer_reviews.author: Maggie Musquez

customer_reviews.title: Great cover for the price!
customer_reviews.text: I got a puppy who was destroying the fabric on my couch. I needed a good washable cover & this one was recommended by a friend. It came with a strap but I have no idea how to attach it. No worries though- it stays on without it because I can tuck it between the bottom & back cushions. So far he’s thrown up on it & it was easy to clean. The only negative is that it’s static-y & sometimes I shock my pup when I pet him. Still, it serves the purpose & his hair comes off easily.
customer_reviews.author: K.M. Hampton

customer_reviews.title: Nice fabric, poor strap
customer_reviews.text: I like this cover because it is water resistant and cleans easily. It’s also got a lot of give in terms of fabric. However the straps on it are poorly made. I got this over other brands specifically for its strap. I have two dogs who don’t know what personal space is so they are always getting on the couch. Move the fabric all over as times goes on. I had hoped the strap would hold better but I find myself constantly having to fix them as I find them slowly tearing through the fabric of the strap, creating a rip in the strap. Other than the strap issue, they are good covers.
customer_reviews.author: Marissa Platon

customer_reviews.title: Great product easy to measure with diagram.
customer_reviews.text: Woeth the money after I bought one from Carol Wright catalog. I'll probably give that one away or ditch it. This one from you was easy to measure and a perfect fit. And having the elastic strap made it even better. Thanks for a grat product. Just got on couch today so was unable to rate with stars, sorry. I wrote the above immediately upon putting the cover on my couch before I could find out if it was a tially water resistant so I tested it purposely and the water roled up like it I thought it would and didn't sink through. I am very happy with this cover immensely.
customer_reviews.author: Ginny

customer_reviews.title: Looks very nice
customer_reviews.text: Ordered the claret to cover my sofa to protect it from cat hair. It fits very well (although it took me a while to figure out how to put it on). Really like this cover....use it to keep my kitty from snagging her nails on my sofa. Does collect cat hairs but a couple swipes with a rubber glove picks them up quickly. and looks quite nice. I am happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: cam

customer_reviews.title: Moves too easy.
customer_reviews.text: I liked this cover at first but it’s impossible to stay in place. Im gonna have to rig it somehow to be tied behind the couch because it falls down too easily. I have to completely take it off and put it back in place multiple times a day. I have soo much extra fabric that hangs behind the couch too and it just constantly falls no matter how i tuck it in the couch
customer_reviews.author: Mttol

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect! Bought the large for a big loveseat/sleeper sofa and it fit perfectly with a few inches to spare on each side for tucking. The light taupe was true to the color portrayed in the photo (white/greige hue without looking yellowish). While I haven't used this particular cover before, I've used other brands that were durable and washed very well. Feeling the quality of the material, I expect this to be no different.
customer_reviews.author: CMC

customer_reviews.title: Fits well - easy to put on and take off.
customer_reviews.text: Bought the extra large couch cover. Covers well with enough slack to tuck in slightly. The only negative is the fabric seems to be a little thin so not sure how long it will last with nightly use. It stays in place pretty well, and we need to adjust it about once a week. Not often and very easy to do. All in all, pleased. So much so, we later ordered the large chair cover for our rocker/recliner. Besides thicker more durable fabric, I wish it also had "wings" to wrap around the back of the sofa and chair above the armrests. Otherwise we are happy with the product.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Keep your sofa cover in place
customer_reviews.text: Other reviewers had complained about the cover not staying put. Here is what I did: I measured the length of the back of the sofa and went to a machine shop and bought a 60" long piece of steel (the length of my sofa back), 1/8" thick, 2" wide. Then I turned over the top of the cover that hangs over the back 3" and stitched it down. I slid the steel inside the tube and that keeps it in place. 10 minutes and $5! Great product, nice looking, washes and dries great!
customer_reviews.author: B. Kuhlmann

customer_reviews.title: It does it's job
customer_reviews.text: It's not super fancy and expensive but it dies exactly what it's meant to do. It does slip off the back a little but only when really getting comfy on the couch like laying down. And to be fair my couch is leather so I can't use the straps to secure it. I'm happy with it and pleased with the price. The material feels similar to your run of the mill cotton comforter. So soft but nothing fancy. Edit: still great but if I had to do it again I'd get the full cover. It gets extremely annoying fixing it all the time. My couch is leather and I can not use the straps.
customer_reviews.author: missy

customer_reviews.title: Excellent cover for pet owners
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this for about 9 months and have 2 English Springer Spaniels. This product has been used every day and washed once every 2 weeks since ownership. It has held up admirably. To wash, I just throw it in the washer and it is good as new every time. So far, no fraying or signs of coming apart. Built to last and makes the girls happy. I highly recommend for pet owners.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Fiore

customer_reviews.title: DOES NOT PROTECT
customer_reviews.text: If I could give this product less than one star I would. Don't believe the description. This product will not protect your furniture from moisture or stains.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher M Hayes

customer_reviews.title: Mediocre quality
customer_reviews.text: The cover fits well and has an adjustable strap which is great for keeping it tight to the couch and not sloppy looking; however you have to loosen it when you sit otherwise it pulls. it ripped off within a week. It was not even pulled tight it had slack in it. They’re easy to wipe clean, we didn’t get them wet so i can’t vouch for the water resistance. They’re soft but not plushy.
customer_reviews.author: patricia

customer_reviews.title: Perfect if you have pets!!
customer_reviews.text: I have an aging dog and a new puppy and wanted a couch protector that was waterproof and was also able to blend in and not be too noticeable. My sofa is very long (94 inches) so I wasn’t sure if this would be a good fit or not... but It is just great! Very soft and comfortable to sit on and stays in place very well. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: KAM

customer_reviews.title: Pretty much what I expected
customer_reviews.text: I got this because I'm still training my cats to not scratch my furniture (and I just got a new couch). It's also great because it's softer than the fabric of my couch. I wouldn't say that the cover is particularly thick so not sure yet about the durability (I've only had it for about a week). It stays in place for the most part, although you do have to straighten out and adjust it at times, but it looks good on. So far I'm happy with the purchase and feel it was worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Audrey Lynn Peterson

customer_reviews.title: As advertised, but better!
customer_reviews.text: I can't honestly speak to the durability of these covers since I haven't had them long enough to comment,but I can tell you that they fit beautifully and look great. They seem to be made quite well and took all of thirty seconds to put on, so that tells you the shape is perfect. They're a lighter weight quilted style, which I like. We take them off for company, but I wouldn't be embarrassed by any means if people saw them. A great buy!
customer_reviews.author: anne m.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size quilted cover
customer_reviews.text: Just a perfect size to go over the wicker couch in our sun room, which is used by our two dachshunds pretty much 24/7. The side 'flaps' are long enough to go over the wicker arms so that the cover will stay securely in place, plus the width of the 'front and back' are long enough so that even burrowing dachshunds shouldn't be able to dig underneath it either!
customer_reviews.author: Sue D

customer_reviews.title: JUST DON'T SPEND YOUR MONEY ON THIS!!!
customer_reviews.text: If you lay on it, you'll need to get up and straighten it out as it seems to have the magic ability to bunch up under you. Every darn day need to pull the couch away from the wall and pull down on the back (yes through the el-cheapo elastic band), and straighten it out enough to be comfortable, enough to rest. Just DON'T!!! PS - it also collects pet hair really, really good too.
customer_reviews.author: bpbudeman

customer_reviews.title: Great For Our RV Sofa
customer_reviews.text: This extra large cover fits our RV Jackknife sofa perfect. I wanted a cover that would be easy to take off and put back on since this sofa turns into a bed. This one is very easy to put on and since the back of the sofa is so close to the wall the cover stays in place perfectly without the elastic strap. It is also much softer than the material of the sofa itself. The material is light weight but I imagine it will hold up well to our use.
customer_reviews.author: A. Hart

customer_reviews.title: It's fine
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my leather sofa. I am aware that it is to be used for fabric -sofas, not leather or vinyl. However, the reviews of the other couch covers that are meant for slippery leather, were not good. Many of the reviews indicated that these other sofa covers stuck to the leather and damaged it. Therefore I decided to buy this since it does not have a sticky surface. Yes, it slips off all the time, but at least my leather sofa still looks great underneath.
customer_reviews.author: J. Rogan

customer_reviews.title: Functions exactly as we need!
customer_reviews.text: Overall, this product does EXACTLY what we need it to do. It protects our linen sofas from dog hair and tears, and since the arrival of our new baby, it protects from spitup and other surprise baby-related fluids. It is not “waterproof” but more so water resistant. Nothing has penetrated through to our couches so I have no complaints! It does not stay in place well, but I’ve gotten into a habit of tucking it in multiple times a day. It’s a mind over matter situation and I don’t mind! We also got the loveseat version which is a little large but still functions well. Very pleased with this purchase!!
customer_reviews.author: JLMB

customer_reviews.title: Great. Get a size bigger than you think.
customer_reviews.text: For my love seat and sofa, I measured and bought the standard fits. And, technically, yes, they fit. But, if you plan to use the furniture beyond a visual piece, get a size bigger. That way, you can tuck it into the cushions and such, use it, and it won't immediately fall out of place. I went and bought the larger size for my sofa, moved the sofa one to the loveseat, and used the loveseat one padding elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, Looks Great
customer_reviews.text: We have four boys and a German Shepard so we needed a barrier between them and our couch. This cover does not fit completely over our couch and the larger one would have been a drape, but that’s because it’s a reclining sofa and not a standard one. Otherwise, this product looks great and feels very comfortable. It does seem to attract the dog’s hair like a magnet, more so than our couch typically did, but that’s not so much of a problem with regular washing.
customer_reviews.author: Cameron

customer_reviews.title: Excellent features on this couch cover
customer_reviews.text: I bought a cover at a national retailer and have used it for years. Now the backing is slowly falling apart, so I purchased this product. The thing I like about it the most is the part hanging over the back of the couch is very long, so doesn't fall down when you sit down. There is a strap too, which I have yet to figure out how to use, but it seems unnecessary so far. I really like the reversible nature of the cover and it looks very finished. I haven't had it long or washed it yet, so can't comment on those items, but, so far - so good!
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen L. Gallagher

customer_reviews.title: Served the Purpose
customer_reviews.text: I bought the RHF Reversible Sofa Cover to cover a sofa I just bought. I do not need it for any of the purposes suggested because I do not have children or pets. I just wanted to cover my brand new sofa because I am having work done in my apartment. I do not plan to keep it on the sofa. I will say that it is good if I want to binge out on the sofa and watch tv. My sofa is 72 inches long. The oversize is too big. I gave this 5 stars because it was delivered timely, no smell, and it suits my purpose; being too big doesn't matter to me.
customer_reviews.author: Alberta W. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Just okay
customer_reviews.text: Pros: good color and it is better than laying a sheet over the couch Cons: impossible to clean. I don’t know if it’s the material, but pet hair doesn’t come off of it. We usually cover the couch with a sheet to avoid dog hair but we wanted to try something that looked a bit nicer. Shaking it out, vacuuming it, putting it the washer: none of those things get off pet hair. We have never had an issue getting pet hair off of sheets or blankets, but for some reason it sticks to this cover.
customer_reviews.author: Court

customer_reviews.title: Love these! Update....
customer_reviews.text: Really love these sofa covers for my oversized sofa and chair. I haven’t experienced the water resistance yet. But it’s easy to clean. Easy to remove pet hair (you can roll the hair right off). Very soft. Doesn’t come off the couch. Update: My puppy pee’d on the cover twice. I caught it on time....the urine beaded up and didn’t go through. I was able to hand wash and dry that particular part. And the best part...the cover protected my new couch! Very happy with my couch covers. In fact, bought another one....just for back up.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice casual sofa cover
customer_reviews.text: I use this on a couch that is shared by our poodle (no cover) and guests (cover on) . It throws on and tucks in easily, pulls off even quicker, and is machine washable in a reasonably big washer. The strap to hold it on the back of the sofa is not stylish, and I don't use it anyway since I don't just leave it on. Serviceable, which is all I needed.
customer_reviews.author: RBY

customer_reviews.title: Measure your couch
customer_reviews.text: I just estimated how big my couch was and it doesn’t quite fit. The elastic band to go around the back is too small so the top doesn’t stay on. So it doesn’t do the job for me. But it does look nice when it sits on the couch before anyone sits there and it moves all over. And it did protect my couch when my little dog got excited and peed. It was easy to toss in the wash. Wish I would’ve ordered the right size.
customer_reviews.author: Val Dobson

customer_reviews.title: One was way too big
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two of these for our old peeling couches, they improved the look of our living room 1000% My only complaint is that I measured out both couches before I ordered and one of them arrived ill fitting and when I contacted customer support they made a point of saying I should have measured it out better. They gave me a 10% refund, but I'm still at a loss of what I'm supposed to do with this too big couch cover. No amount of tucking makes it look any better.
customer_reviews.author: AM

customer_reviews.title: Great Protection From Active Animals!
customer_reviews.text: Bought the cover because we have two VERY active Labradors, and needed to protect the top of the couch from their need to perch in the window above the furniture. Easy to install, has done well keeping dog hair and dirt off the couch. The arm covers need some sort of weight to keep them in place as people and animals get on and off the couch, but it is a minor concern. Overall I love how it fits and how it looks on my sofa!
customer_reviews.author: Denise D. Randall

customer_reviews.title: Not what I though it would be.
customer_reviews.text: This was fine, but it is really nothing more than a quilted blanket with couch arm cut outs. I have a leather couch and it slides all over the place, and I have to keep tucking it in. It might be better on a cloth couch, bit I wouldn't buy this one again. In fact if it weren't covered in dog hair the first day I would have returned it. This lasted a week before I tossed it into the trash.
customer_reviews.author: Mel Bear

customer_reviews.title: Great Cover
customer_reviews.text: Finally got to put the cover on the couch! Works great. I have already washed twice, because I wash after the dogs visit! It is holding up great. No one has spilled anything on it, so I cannot rate that part. Overall, I am very pleased. Would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Paula

customer_reviews.title: I will keep buying them
customer_reviews.text: These covers are inexpensive and keep the dog hair off the furniture. They are waterproof until the first wash. My dogs are vigorous in their attempts to get comfortable so I have found that the fabric is a bit thin and the dogs eventually tear the covers. Fortunately, they are affordable to replace. They do tend to slip and need to be adjusted occasionally but that could be because my dogs are assholes.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this product!!! I was concerned even after measuring my sofa if it would fit well. It fits great. The fabric is very soft. My cat thinks it is his new bed. I have put accent pillows on it that are a grey color on the black cover and it looks like a totally different sofa. Very happy with the looks and feel.
customer_reviews.author: Susan A.

customer_reviews.title: Chipmunk children can't use my couch as a crumb catch now!
customer_reviews.text: Oh my gosh! It's a product I never knew I needed, but I'm incredibly happy to have! My kids are disgusting couch goblins. Always spilling food and stuffing wrappers in my couches even though I tell them not to. Go figure! I shampooed and cleaned out my sofas and bought 2 covers, each in the couch colors. My couches are now crumb free and the covers take the brunt of the mess. Super easy to take off and toss in the weekly wash. Love them! And they were super reasonably priced.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Good Product, sizing off
customer_reviews.text: The quality of the product is great and as expected but the size was not what I was looking for. I got the 3 cushion sofa size and it does not fit length wise, which was disappointing. Our couch is average length so I am upset that it didn't fit. I like the quality and would like the look of the product if it fit correctly so if the sizing were to be adjusted, then it would be perfect. So if you're looking for a cover to fit your normal sized couch, this isn't for you but if you have a small 3 cushion couch or a love seat then I would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: mel

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: I love this, it is exactly what I was looking for. I just bought a new sectional and also got a new puppy, which don’t go well together at all! Lol. And yes, I use it on a sectional, I just tuck the other couch arm cover into the corner cushion of my sectional and it works just fine. I will say there’s a small rip in it, and I’ve been using it for only about a month. That may be my fault because I tug at it pretty hard when I’m adjusting it on my couch... nevertheless, it’s a great product for the price
customer_reviews.author: Paige Mosier

customer_reviews.title: Feels and looks great.
customer_reviews.text: Pretty much exactly what the picture shows. This thing is great because it doesn't slide off the couch like a blanket does. I still have to adjust and pull it sometimes but hardly ever compared to how often you have to make adjustments with a blanket. it's also nice material. it doesn't feel hot or plasticky against your skin. It fr eels like a quilt or something. I wish it covered the corners better but I will definitely be keeping this for many years.
customer_reviews.author: Edward Leininger

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't stay in place
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be a good material and easy to clean but my biggest complaint is that it doesn't stay in place. It comes with a large elastic band that is suppposed to attach to the cover and encompass the back of the couch. But the band itself isn't large enough and doesn't want to stay attached to the cover, so the cover doesn't want to stay in place. The overall size of the cover was fine for my large couch. I will continue to use but this probably isn't something that I would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: Sofa saver
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to help protect my velvet sofa from my two cats. They have a tendency to lay on the sofa when I'm not home and at night, so I wanted to be able to protect it in an easy and efficient way. I throw this on at night and when I'm not home and take it off when I'm up and about. It keeps all the hair and debris off my sofa and I can just throw it in the washer when I need to clean it. Make sure to measure your sofa first! I didn't and it's technically a few inches too small, but I didn't feel like returning it and waiting for a new one.
customer_reviews.author: MC King

customer_reviews.title: Just what we needed
customer_reviews.text: I have had this for several months. With 3 cats and a dog, it is great for keeping pet hair off of the sofa. When we have company, we take the cover off and the sofa is clean. Easy to vacuum and machine wash. I really like the dimensions of this, especially with the way it covers the back of and the arms of our furniture. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: MacB

customer_reviews.title: Fits well, serves purpose.
customer_reviews.text: My couch started to fray and we didnt want to buy a new one since we are moving to a new state soon. We bought this to cover the fraying and make it look nicer, until we buy a new couch. It fits well and looks good. We have kids and this stops crumbs and toys from getting stuck into the cushions. If this fits on the new couch we will probably still use it because it is very comfortable and looks nice.
customer_reviews.author: Alexandria t

customer_reviews.title: Colors are all wrong. Descriptions and pictures do not match what you get.
customer_reviews.text: The color descriptions are so wrong. I ordered what looked like a sage green/light green and what I got is gray/light gray. I want to order a replacement but it doesn’t look like they have the color I want. That sucks cause I really like it. I attached a photo of what I got and a screenshot of what feldgrau is supposed to be.
customer_reviews.author: sbrack97058

customer_reviews.title: Terrific product
customer_reviews.text: My 4 legged family members leave hair on everything. I got tired of using old sheets so I invested in the sofa and loveseat covers. Very nice color and easy to install (for lack of a better word). They wash and dry beautifully. Furry family enjoying them. Terrific product for the money. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: jane r

customer_reviews.title: excellent buy
customer_reviews.text: Perfect if you allow pets on the couch. I used to put blankets down until I purchased this - so much easier! Stays out with the easily adjustable straps provided. I wash about once every other week unless it’s shedding season. I’ve had it about 7 months and looks brand new after all those machine washes. Will purchase again when mine gets worn out.
customer_reviews.author: Jena Johns

customer_reviews.title: Fits perfectly
customer_reviews.text: I ordered to cover a new couch with end recliners. It fits perfectly. I really like the elastic to hold it on the back. I have 2 dogs and many dog visitors to my house. It covers the arms and footrest plus long enough in the back for reclining. I have not washed it yet. So I do not know about durablility. I would defintely purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Sassy Rider

customer_reviews.title: Great couch protector!
customer_reviews.text: I love this. I got the black jumbo size for my couch. My couch is dual power reclinable. It's a little big for my couch. But I wanted it to be big, that way it covered the entire couch when we reclin. And because I got the bigger size. It stays on and doesn't fall off. I wash it by throwing it in my washing machine. My toddler spills milk and it doesn't go through. My dog jumps up and my couch is still protected!!! Definitely recommend. I also am purchasing one just for my recliner chair!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Pike

customer_reviews.title: Does not work for my leather couch :-(
customer_reviews.text: This cover does not stay on my couch. The straps do help to hold it in place near the bottom of the back. However, when I sit on the couch or my dogs wrestle, the back and arms fall down and it scrunches up. I have a leather reclining couch. My lab's hair also sticks to it and is very difficult to clean. Material is good quality and it is well made. Just did not work as I hoped for my couch.
customer_reviews.author: AHarms

customer_reviews.title: MAKE SURE YOU KNOW WHAT SIZE YOUR COUCH IS
customer_reviews.text: I love the cover it looks great on the couch i got from Habitat for humanity resale store, i did get the wrong size though it was too big but that was my fault. I am not upset about the bigger size as it does cover more of my couch the only thing i had to do was take the arm covers and pin them back to not look so baggy. This is a great deal for the price of an amazing product but make sure you know what size your couch is!
customer_reviews.author: Sargent Dude

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t stay in place
customer_reviews.text: I read reviews before purchasing and it does not state it is waterproof so I did not expect this. But how very quickly a spill soaks thru is surprising. Product looks great (I got dark brown) and fits well. UNTIL you actually sit on couch or dogs jump on it. Then the elastic strap flips off clip and entire back falls down. Arm covers don’t stay up either. So it’s really no better than just throwing a blanket on the couch. Disappointed in this product.
customer_reviews.author: P H

customer_reviews.title: Handles minor leaks
customer_reviews.text: One of my dogs is incontinent, so it's hard to find something to protect the couch. We've tried underpads from Sam's, but they make noise and end up shifting towards the back. I set up the cover like this, offering a little more protection. If she has a tiny leak, I just spray Nature's Miracle on it. If it's more, I change it out. Not sure if I ruined previous couch covers due to the way I washed them (different brand), but I like this one so I wash it in cold water. I don't think I'll try it with the strap (don't even know where it is) since we're more focused on leak protection.
customer_reviews.author: hamstermom

customer_reviews.title: Looks and works great!
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect! Bought these for our new leather recliner couch and recliners to help protect it from our dogs. I ordered the larger couch size and the over sized recliner covers and they worked great! The couch reclines fine with the covers on. I do have to adjust it every so often but that’s okay, it’s much better than the blanket I was having to use!! Also, I used safety pins to hold the back flap of the couch to the strap that holds it in place.
customer_reviews.author: lthurman

customer_reviews.title: It doesnt stay on the couch.
customer_reviews.text: I have no complaints about the quality of this product. But the function of it is awful. Even with the elastic strap I cannot get thr cover to actually stay on the couch. I ended up giving it to my mother inlaw and everytime I go to her house I see that she had the same problem The cover just slides right off every time you sit on it. If you are okay with fixing it everytime you use it, than I will say that it washes up very nice and is easy to keep clean!
customer_reviews.author: Laura E.

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Cover
customer_reviews.text: This cover is incredible! Been using it for over a year - with two large dogs periodically sharing the couch, as well. It looks as good as it did when I first put it on. It is so easy to use, washes so easily, dries quickly, easy to place on the sofa. And no matter what we have spilled on it, it comes out. Can’t recommend it enough, I will definitely buy another one.
customer_reviews.author: Rainy

customer_reviews.title: HORRIBLE ITEM. DO NOT RECOMMEND
customer_reviews.text: Just all around a bad product. our ripped the same day we got it. The straps completely RIP off. I had to throw it in my linen closet n use a blanket instead. I would NOT RECOMMEND THIS ITEM. if it wasn't such a hassle to try and send back during the Corvid-19 stay home orders I'd quickly return for my money back.
customer_reviews.author: George H

customer_reviews.title: Looks decent, pretty good fit
customer_reviews.text: The sizing was accurate for my couch. Like that it is reversable with 2 colors - the lighter green is a very close match to the couch. Has held up well but it does slip a little from the back, even after adjusting, but just a little bunching. Now the dog gets to snuggle without ruining the furniture.
customer_reviews.author: Tippy Toe

customer_reviews.title: Refuses to stay in place
customer_reviews.text: While this couch cover is water proof and easy to clean, it’s hard to actually protect the couch considering the cover refuses to stay in place. The second you sit down, everything shifts. The back falls off. The arm cover falls down. The elastic that wraps around the couch does little to keep the back in place. Every time you get up, you have to fix it. If the wind blows, you have to fix it. I wish I could return this, but my window has closed. The pros do not outweigh the cons for this cover.
customer_reviews.author: Allie

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and good price!
customer_reviews.text: photograph, but it is still a very nice and neutral shade of green! It was fairly easy to put on the couch/loveseat and it stays really well too. It isn't padded, which is fine, and the material isn't really rough. When sitting on it, it is pretty comfortable, but I definitely don't feel like it is as soft as the couch/loveseat itself or the fabric on the couch. Overall, I am definitely happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Taylor Spangler

customer_reviews.title: Second Purchase of this Cover
customer_reviews.text: I love this sofa cover. It looks good and my first one has held up great through washings. I bought a second one simply because my current one gets heavy use and now I have a brand new one if "company's coming.." Yes, in my house the sofa stays covered even with company because the animals ARE going to get on the sofa! Highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: D. Green

customer_reviews.title: Was just as expected and worth it
customer_reviews.text: I was tired of laying assorted blankets all over the sofa for my dog and this was perfect. I throw it in the wash (as recommended) which is much easier than spot cleaning the couch. It’s also very lightweight so it’s actually cooler than the throw blankets- important as we live in a tropical environment. It fits perfectly and doesn’t slide much on our sofa. I’m thinking of getting another so I can rotate them on laundry day.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Myers HI

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: Love this cover! It is a bit heavier and more durable feeling than previous covers we've had. This also means that it tends to stay in place better and not move around on the couch as easily as the lighter weight covers we've had in the past. Love the color too, beautiful!!
customer_reviews.author: Sandra

customer_reviews.title: It’s comfy and stays in place
customer_reviews.text: Got it for the larger couch. Like it a lot. Need to get a smaller one (for the smaller couch spouse says). Only had for week so haven’t washed it yet. Dogs have fun time running and jumping around, so far pretty much stayed in place. Also, material soft and comfy. Doesn’t get too hot.
customer_reviews.author: Cat W.

product_meta.title: RHF Couch Protectors for Dogs,Reversible Pet Protector Furniture Covers,Sofa Protector Cover,Wide Chair Cover,Couch Covers,Extra Large Sofa Slipcover,Width 78"(Sofa-Extra Wide:Chocolate/Beige)
feature_bullets: PROTECT: protects furniture from stains. Great for homes with kids and pets.
SEAT WIDTH: 1-seat 21'' Recliner-Small, 1-seat 30'' Recliner-Oversized, 2-seat 54''Loveseat, 3-seat 68'' Sofa, 3-seat 78'' XL-Sofa, 3-seat 70'' Futon. See MEASURING GUIDE in photos.
STAYS IN PLACE: features elastic strap to help prevent sliding. NOT RECOMMENDED FOR LEATHER.
REVERSIBLE: double the use and a fresh look in new seasons. Reverse side with stylish trim.
EASY CARE: machine wash (cold) and dry (cool).

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars7,217 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
